analysis: The documents outline the order of succession for various cabinet positions in the event of absence, death, resignation, or disability of the primary office holders. They specify who is authorized to perform the duties of the Secretary in different departments, ensuring continuity of government operations. The documents cover various departments including Commerce, Health and Human Services, War, Interior, Justice, Homeland Security, Housing and Urban Development, State, Defense, Treasury, Agriculture, and Veterans Affairs.
title: Presidential Directives on Departmental Succession
